verbose_text: With peroxisome proliferator activated receptor alpha mediated upregulation of lipoprotein lipase, there is also increased catabolism of triglyceride rich lipoproteins VLDL and IDL, XREF_BIBR further resulting in triglyceride relatively deficient LDL particles which are poor substrates for both hepatic lipase as well as cholesterol ester transfer protein.
evidence: peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor alpha-mediated upregulation of lipoprotein lipase
